maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Enough of that.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Assez de tout cela.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: How?! Why?!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Comment ?! Pourquoi ?!

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Lea...\. \c[3]someone has interfered\c[0].
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Lea...\. \c[3]Quelqu'un a interféré\c[0].

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Someone hacked the environment server and managed to drag you out of the raid. Right when you teleported.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Quelqu'un a piraté le serveur d'environnement pour te sortir du raid. Pile au moment où tu t'es téléportée.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: I noticed signs of somebody tampering with the systems shortly before it happened...
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Juste avant que ça arrive, j'avais remarqué que quelqu'un était en train d'altérer le système...

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: But it was too late for me to react.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Mais c'était trop tard, je pouvais plus réagir.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: It looks like we are somewhere close to Bergen Trail.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: On dirait que l'on est quelque part aux alentours du \v[area.bergen-trails.name]

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: However, this place is pretty much isolated. No connection to the official playground. We are trapped.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Mais cet endroit est assez isolé. Aucune connexion avec le Terrain de Jeu. On est coincé.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: ...Why?
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: I have no idea who did it or why... But they likely have a reason to bring you to this place.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: J'ai aucune idée de qui a fait ça ou pourquoi... Mais ils devaient bien avoir une raison pour t'amener ici.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: I suggest we have a look around and see what happens. Please be careful.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Je suggère que l'on explore et que l'on regarde ce qui se passe. Sois prudente.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Have a look around and try to figure out why you have been teleported to this location.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Regardez les alentours et essayez de comprendre pourquoi vous avez été téléporté à cet endroit.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Teleportation and D-Link all seem to be blocked. They have been very thorough.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: La téléportation et les D-Links sont bloqués. Ils ont vraiment pensé à tout.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Finally we meet again!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Enfin nous nous rencontrons à nouveau !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: What an enjoyable sight.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Quelle vue merveilleuse nous avons là.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Like a little bird, once caged, now flying around freely.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Comme un petit oiseau, auparavant dans une cage, et maintenant libre de voler.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Why?
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Pourquoi ?

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Hm. The little bird became rather talkative, didn't it?
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Hm. Le petit oiseau serait-il devenu bavard ?

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: How?
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Comment ?

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Enough of that.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Assez de tout cela.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: As much as you might enjoy your freedom...
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Bien que tu puisses apprécier ta liberté...

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: You should be aware that you don't belong in this place.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Tu devrais savoir que tu n'es pas à ta place ici.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: ...Why?
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: So you are still clueless? Very peculiar.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Donc tu n'en as toujours aucune idée ? Très étrange.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: It matters not. We are here to take you with us. Once again.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Peu importe. Nous sommes ici pour t'emmener avec nous. Une fois de plus.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: And with no interference by pesky mortals this time around.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Et sans que ces pénibles mortels puissent interférer, cette fois.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Now, there is certainly no reason to rush.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Mais bon, il n'y a aucune raison de se précipiter.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Let us not forget the purpose of this realm.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: N'oublions pas la raison de ce monde.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: People gather in this place by the thousands.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Les gens se rendent ici par milliers.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Why do you think that is?
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Pourquoi penses-tu qu'ils le font ?

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Because they seek the \c[3]experience\c[0].
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Parce qu'ils cherchent le \c[3]frisson\c[0].

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: The experience of reading the situation, predicting the patterns, and finding the weak spot.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Le frisson, d'analyser la situation, de prédire les mouvements et de trouver les points faibles.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: They seek the experience... of the \c[3]challenge\c[3]!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Ils cherchent le frisson... du \c[3]challenge\c[0] !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: And we... provide this experience.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Et nous... produisons ce frisson.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Our very existence... is dedicated to this experience.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Notre entière existence... est dédiée à ce frisson.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Allow us to demonstrate.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Laisse-moi te faire une démonstration.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: En garde!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: En garde !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Hahahahaha!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Hahahahaha !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Let us start simple with \c[3]Heat\c[0] and \c[3]Cold\c[0], the elements of your own!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Laissez-nous commencer doucement. Avec le \c[3]Chaud\c[0] et le \c[3]Froid\c[0], les éléments qui sont les tiens !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Good! Now then...\. how will you fare with the other two elements?
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Bien ! Et ensuite...\. Comment vas-tu t'en sortir avec les deux autres éléments ?
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.note: de: comment vas-tu combattre contre les deux autres elements ?

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Intriguing! Now to climb up the curve a bit further!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Intéressant ! Il est temps de monter d'un cran !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Just wonderful! We are slowly reaching the climax!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: C'est juste formidable ! Nous atteignons lentement le clou du spectacle !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Now it is time for the grand finale!!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Maintenant, c'est l'heure de la grande finale !!

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: ...\. We forget about your...\. \c[1]ridiculous damage output\c[0].
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: ...\.Nous avions oublié tes...\. \c[1]dégâts ridiculement élevées\c[0].

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Hahahaha! It looks like you are still not satisfied!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Hahahaha ! On dirait que tu n'es toujours pas satisfaite !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Okay Lea. We now understand who interfered.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: OK Lea. Maintenant on sait qui a interféré.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: I will try my best to get control over this situation.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Je vais faire tout ce que je peux pour retrouver le contrôle de la situation.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: You need to give me as much time as possible. Please play along with him and keep him busy.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Il faut que tu me donnes autant de temps que possible. Continue de jouer à son jeu et occupe-le.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: en_US
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: fr_FR

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Okay Lea, time to escape!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: OK Lea, il est temps de s'enfuir !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: There will be a teleporter to the right! Run to it and use it as quickly as possible!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Il va y avoir un téléporter à droite ! Cours par là et utilise-le aussi vite que possible !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Huh. What do we have here?
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Hm ? Qu'avons-nous là ?

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Stop right there!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Reste là où tu es !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Was that all? How very disappointing.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Est-ce que c'est tout ? C'était tellement décevant.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Getting a little help from somebody it seems?
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Il semblerait que quelqu'un t'offre un petit peu d'aide ?

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: It was to be expected, really.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Vraiment, on pouvait s'y attendre.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Alas, we cannot afford to lose you a second time.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Hélas, nous ne pouvons nous permettre de te perdre une deuxième fois.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: The \c[3]experience\c[0] is now over.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Terminé avec le \c[3]frisson\c[0].

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: The balanced struggle, a challenge to create, a challenge to master... it ends now.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Le combat équilibré, le défi à créer, le défi à réussir... Tout ceci est terminé.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: What follows is the \c[3]impossible\c[0].
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Ce qui suit, est l'\c[3]impossible\c[0].

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: And the impossible...\. is trivial.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Et l'impossible...\. est trivial.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Prepare for a sequence of bottomless difficulty.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Prépare-toi à une série de difficulté croissante sans fin.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: \c[3]One more hit\c[0] and the struggle is over.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: \c[3]Encore un coup\c[0] et la lutte est terminée.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Attack number \v[tmp.designer.finalDash]!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Attaque numéro \v[tmp.designer.finalDash] !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Attack number \v[tmp.designer.finalDash]!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Attaque numéro \v[tmp.designer.finalDash] !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Attack number \v[tmp.designer.finalDash]!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Attaque numéro \v[tmp.designer.finalDash] !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Attack number \v[tmp.designer.finalDash]!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Attaque numéro \v[tmp.designer.finalDash] !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Attack number \v[tmp.designer.finalDash]!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Attaque numéro \v[tmp.designer.finalDash] !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Attack number \v[tmp.designer.finalDash]!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Attaque numéro \v[tmp.designer.finalDash] !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Attack number \v[tmp.designer.finalDash]!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Attaque numéro \v[tmp.designer.finalDash] !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: Hit!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Touché !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: You have been captured at last.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Enfin, nous t'attrapons dans notre filet.

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: We will now send you to where you belong!
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: Nous allons maintenant t'envoyer là où se trouve réellement ta place !

maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.orig: WHAT.
maps/bergen-trail/excluded-1.json/entiti.text: QUOI.
